snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said the nonmanufacturing activity was healthy, and ADP said 209,000 private sector jobs were added in March.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of nonmanufacturing activity fell to 56 in March, from its 12-month high of 57.3 in February; payroll processor ADP says the economy added 209,000 private sector jobs in March.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said the nonmanufacturing activity was healthy, and ADP said 209,000 private sector jobs were added in March.

headline.main: Service Jobs Increased in March, Data Shows
headline.print_headline: Service Jobs Increased In March, Data Shows
